paper.title: Stock exchange prediction and portfolio administration by statistics and artificial neural networks
paper.abstract: This paper describes the techniques used to develop a system capable of modeling the complex relations of the Mexican stock exchange by statistics methods as Principal Component Analysis (PCA) and Artificial Neural Networks (ANN). Finally, portfolio administration is performed via quadratic programming and genetic algorithms (GA). These methodologies constitute an alternative to classic statistical models of regression, variance and mean.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术应用于墨西哥股票交易所的建模，并最终通过二次规划和遗传算法进行投资组合管理，这明确属于投资组合管理领域。
